name: Tactical RPG Battle Demo
description:
Play the the demo of a currently unannounced tactical RPG. Take your skills into battle in this short, single level demo and try to defeat the enemy!
This demo only includes the battle part of the game. There are more RPG features like a dialouge system, equipment and more that are in development which you can check out on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvkZ-dBMvIw3as1Clx_OrVA

Contact: pontus@pomedev.com
